Andy's Blog

Welcome to the blog

10 June 2014

Welcome to my blog! This is where I’ll be chronicling my summer as a Rails Dev intern at Viget’s Durham office. I’ll be keeping track of my progress on each of the projects that I work on, the technologies that I’m learning and any interesting resources or bugs I come across. Thanks for reading!

About Me

Hi everyone! I'm (almost) a graduate of the University of North Carolina where I studied computer science and astrophysics. This summer, I'll be working at Viget's Durham office as a Rails Dev Intern. On this blog, I'll be keeping track of the projects that I work on, the different technologies and resources that I'm learning and anything that I generally find interesting and relevant.
